entry.title: One of My Most Productive Days Was Throwing Away 1000 Lines of Code.
entry.content: “One of my most productive days was throwing away 1000 lines of code.” – Ken Thompson

entry.title: There Is Nothing More Unproductive Than to Build Something Efficiently That Should Not Have Been Built at All.
entry.content: “There is nothing more unproductive than to build something efficiently that should not have been built at all.” – Milt Bryce

entry.title: It's Better to Wait for a Productive Programmer to Become Available Than It Is to Wait for the First Available Programmer to Become Productive.
entry.content: “It’s better to wait for a productive programmer to become available than it is to wait for the first available programmer to become productive.” – Steve C McConnell

entry.title: Good Specifications Will Always Improve Programmer Productivity Far Better Than Any Programming Tool or Technique.
entry.content: “Good specifications will always improve programmer productivity far better than any programming tool or technique.” – Milt Bryce
